overview: You stumble through your day, waiting for the moment; the moment when you can be together again, in ecstasy. You find yourself holding your breath, waiting expectantly.  Closing your mind to the daily grind, you fixate on the impending sensual gratification. This source of delight and euphoria is all you can think of. Don't delay. It's all waiting for you right here!
title: Playgirl Addicted To Pleasure
